page.title: 11The Cottage Hospital
page.content: The hospital is situated just outside the main shopping centre.It was opened in 1875 by Sir Arthur Elton who was Chairman of the Health Authority.The Hospital has twenty two beds and is split into two wards.If there is a serious casualty,it is sent to a Bristol hospital(B.R.I. Southmead or Frenchay). The hospital employs approximately fifty people,but most work part_time. The X_ray unit is open four and a half days per week.There are ten clinics at the hospital. Paediatric...surgical...medical... chest...stomach care...varicose veins psychiatric...family planning... gynaecological and ante_natal. It is a very busy hospital,coping with about a thousand casualties each month.
